short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps you support 'At The Well' through your shopping and the actions you take.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop for At The Well provides an easy way for At The Well supporters to support At The Well through actions they take and shopping they do.  There are 4 primary pieces of functionality:
1.  Supporters will be prompted to take actions that support the mission of At The Well
2.  When supporters arrive on a site where coupons are available, they will be notified that there are coupons available.
3.  When supporters search through Google - they will see icons that show which partners work with At The Well (coming soon)

Please note that if the end user chooses to click on the offers available through the extension they will be redirected to the partner's (aka advertiser's) site via affiliate cookies.

The privacy policy for this extension is available at http://privacy.shopforcause.io
